data.taskDescription:
Descripción de tareas para completar el frontend en Flutter

Completar los 9 epics del frontend de la aplicación "Pasos" (contador de pasos social) usando Flutter.

================================================================================

CONTEXTO

================================================================================

El backend ya está completo en: project-app-pasos-backend

El frontend debe ir en: project-app-pasos-frontend-flutter (crear nueva estructura)

Usar Flutter para aplicación móvil nativa multiplataforma (iOS/Android)

================================================================================

EPICS A IMPLEMENTAR

================================================================================

FLUTTER FOUNDATION

Setup de Flutter + estructura del proyecto

Configuración de dependencias base (provider/bloc, dio, etc.)

PLATFORM CONFIG

Configuración para iOS/Android

Permisos para Health APIs (HealthKit/Google Fit)

Configuración de AndroidManifest.xml y Info.plist

UI FOUNDATION

Sistema de diseño con Material Design 3

Routing y navegación (go_router)

Tema oscuro/claro (ThemeData)

Widgets reutilizables

AUTH UI

Pantallas de login, registro y recuperación de contraseña

Gestión de estado de autenticación

Almacenamiento seguro de tokens (flutter_secure_storage)

DASHBOARD

Vista principal con contador de pasos

Historial de actividad

Gráficos (fl_chart o charts_flutter)

Pull-to-refresh

SHARING UI

Lista de amigos

Gestión de compartir datos con amigos

Solicitudes de amistad

Vista de actividad de amigos

GOALS UI

Grupos y metas compartidas

Creación y edición de metas

Progreso de grupos

Rankings

NATIVE INTEGRATION

Integración con podómetro nativo usando health package

Lectura de pasos desde HealthKit (iOS)

Lectura de pasos desde Google Fit/Health Connect (Android)

Background sync de datos

REAL-TIME CLIENT

Integración WebSocket con web_socket_channel

Actualizaciones en tiempo real

Notificaciones push (firebase_messaging)

Manejo de reconexión

epics.title: Flutter Foundation - Project Setup and Core Infrastructure
epics.description: Initialize Flutter project with clean architecture folder structure, configure core dependencies (flutter_riverpod, dio, flutter_secure_storage, freezed), create environment configuration for API endpoints, implement Dio client with interceptors for authentication and error handling, create base utility classes and extensions
followsPatterns: Feature-first folder structure under lib/features/
Core utilities under lib/core/
Riverpod for dependency injection and state management
Dio with interceptors for API calls
Environment-based configuration

epics.title: Platform Configuration - iOS and Android Native Setup
epics.description: Configure native platform settings including iOS Info.plist for HealthKit permissions with usage descriptions, iOS entitlements for health data access, Android AndroidManifest.xml for Google Fit/Health Connect permissions and activity recognition, Gradle configurations for health package dependencies, app icons and splash screen setup
followsPatterns: Standard Flutter platform configuration
Health API permission declarations with usage descriptions
Gradle configuration for health package dependencies
iOS entitlements for HealthKit access

epics.title: UI Foundation - Design System and Navigation
epics.description: Implement Material Design 3 theming with ColorScheme.fromSeed, dark/light mode toggle with ThemeMode, typography system with GoogleFonts, spacing and shadow constants. Configure go_router with declarative routes, ShellRoute for bottom navigation, route guards for authentication. Create reusable widget library including AppButton, AppTextField, AppCard, LoadingIndicator, ErrorWidget, EmptyStateWidget, BottomNavBar, AppSnackbar, ShimmerLoading, and PullRefreshWrapper
followsPatterns: Material Design 3 guidelines with ColorScheme.fromSeed
go_router declarative routing with ShellRoute for bottom nav
Reusable widget composition with consistent styling
Theme extension for custom colors and text styles

epics.title: Authentication UI - Login, Register, and Token Management
epics.description: Build authentication screens (LoginScreen, RegisterScreen, ForgotPasswordScreen, SplashScreen) with form validation matching backend validators. Implement UserModel and AuthTokensModel matching backend User schema and JWT response. Create AuthRepository with AuthRemoteDataSource for API calls (POST /auth/register, POST /auth/login, POST /auth/refresh, GET /auth/me) and AuthLocalDataSource for flutter_secure_storage token persistence. Add AuthNotifier with Riverpod for state management including auto-login on app start and token refresh interceptor integration
followsPatterns: Clean architecture layers (data/domain/presentation)
Secure storage for JWT tokens using flutter_secure_storage
Token refresh interceptor pattern with Dio
Riverpod AsyncNotifier for auth state
Form validation matching backend requirements

epics.title: Dashboard - Step Counter and Activity History
epics.description: Build main dashboard screen with today's step count circular progress display, weekly trend line chart using fl_chart, hourly activity bar chart, statistics cards (total steps, daily average, best day, current streak). Implement StepModel matching backend Step schema with source types (native, manual, web). Create StepsRepository with StepsRemoteDataSource for API calls (POST /steps, GET /steps/today, GET /steps/weekly, GET /steps/hourly-peaks, GET /steps/stats). Add pull-to-refresh with RefreshIndicator and StepHistoryScreen for detailed history view with date filtering
followsPatterns: fl_chart for LineChart and BarChart visualizations
Pull-to-refresh with RefreshIndicator
Riverpod FutureProvider for async data fetching
Local caching with steps_local_datasource using shared_preferences

epics.title: Sharing UI - Friends and Social Features
epics.description: Build friends management screens including FriendsScreen with list of accepted friends showing their step counts, FriendRequestsScreen with tabs for incoming pending and sent requests, UserSearchScreen with debounced search for finding users by username (GET /users/search), FriendDetailScreen showing friend's step activity and charts. Implement SharingRelationshipModel matching backend schema with status types (pending, accepted, bidirectional, rejected). Create SharingRepository with API calls for request/accept/reject/revoke actions. Display friend stats using GET /sharing/:userId/stats
followsPatterns: Search with debounce using Timer or rxdart
Tab-based filtering for request status with TabBar
Optimistic UI updates for accept/reject actions
Pull-to-refresh for relationship lists
Slidable list items for quick actions

epics.title: Goals UI - Group Goals and Progress Tracking
epics.description: Build group goals management including GoalsScreen with list of active goals showing progress percentage, CreateGoalScreen with form for title, description, targetSteps, startDate, endDate with validation, GoalDetailScreen showing goal info with member progress list and total contribution, InviteUsersScreen for inviting friends to goals filtered from sharing relationships. Implement GroupGoalModel and GoalMembershipModel matching backend schemas. Create GoalsRepository with full CRUD and invite/join/leave actions. Display progress bars, member rankings sorted by contribution, and goal completion status
followsPatterns: Form validation with real-time feedback
Progress visualization with LinearProgressIndicator and CircularProgressIndicator
Member list sorted by contribution
Date picker using showDateRangePicker
Goal status badges (active, completed, expired)

epics.title: Native Integration - Health APIs and Background Sync
epics.description: Integrate with native health APIs using health package for reading step data from HealthKit (iOS) and Google Fit/Health Connect (Android). Implement HealthService with platform-specific permission handling and step data reading with date range filtering. Create PermissionService for requesting and checking health permissions with graceful degradation when denied. Build StepSyncService for syncing native steps to backend API with source='native'. Add SettingsScreen with HealthPermissionsScreen for managing permissions and viewing sync status. Implement background sync using workmanager package for periodic data synchronization
followsPatterns: Platform-specific permission handling with health package
Background execution with workmanager package
Health data privacy compliance with clear usage descriptions
Graceful degradation when permissions denied
Incremental sync to avoid duplicate step records

epics.title: Real-time Client - WebSocket and Push Notifications
epics.description: Implement WebSocket client using socket_io_client package for real-time step updates and goal progress matching backend Socket.IO server events (steps-updated, sharing:joined, goal-progress, goal:joined, goal:member-joined). Create WebSocketService with automatic reconnection using exponential backoff, authentication via JWT token in handshake. Add FirebaseService for Firebase Cloud Messaging initialization and NotificationService for handling push notifications in foreground/background. Integrate real-time updates into StepsProvider, SharingProvider, and GoalsProvider using StreamProvider for live data refresh. Add ConnectionStatusBanner widget showing connection state
followsPatterns: Socket.IO client compatible with backend server
WebSocket with exponential backoff reconnection
Firebase messaging with foreground/background handlers
Connection status banner for user feedback
Event-driven state updates using Riverpod StreamProvider
